column1: Has anyone written yet on the relation of coronavirus to the anthropocene’s food security crisis, which in turn is related to expanded food diet, i.e., the consumption of “exotic” meat from unusual animal sources (ex. bats, and the transmission of their coronaviruses)?

i just realized that i haven’t seen any #PrayForChina hashtag around so, here it is. The superpower country, tho known for their grave HRVs on Uighur IPs and oppressive human intel schemes, has citizens who are suffering from the coronavirus outbreak.
